page.title: 15Christian T****
page.content: Christian is Sydney T****'s grandson. He has just left school and is waiting to return to school to study for A Levels. He wants to study Art.He's not so forthcoming with information as his grandfather but he does represent a distinct point of view.For Christian, Thackley is a place to live and play, nothing else.He goes to school in Shipley,for fun he goes into Leeds or Bradford.The only amusements for him in the village are the Cricket and Football clubs.He enjoys walking and has recently taken up jogging,and loves the paths through the woods. For an arty person like him,Thackley is a desert.The nearest approaches to culture are the band concerts in the Methodist Church.The best things about Thackley are the frequent buses to take him into town, and the late night ones which bring him home again.
